channel.title: If you could be any Half-life Character who would it be? and why?

item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
DansonDelta40:

Alyx.

What? She is athletic, invincible and armed with a cool autopistol! Alyx kicks ass!

Alyx is not invincible, She’s just resilient but she sure dies, specially on hard mode.

Oh and on thread, There’s a thread like this already…

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=675&highlight=creature
